name: Old Fashioned Rinky Dink
description:
Old Fashioned Rinky Dink is a local multiplayer platformer inspired by the likes of Jump 'n Bump and Super Mario War.  

It's a super simple to play; all you have to do is jump on other players heads to score points. This is an in-development build so please do let comment below if you spot any bugs or have feedback to give.

2 to 8 players can play and all major controllers are supported, and all artwork is from the excellent Kenney Assets.

The game works best with controllers but if you want you can play like it's 1999 and all get cosy around one keyboard -

  • Player 1 - WAD
  • Player 2 - TFH
  • Player 3 - IJL
  • Player 4 - Arrow Keys
  • Player 5 to 8 - Use Controllers!

The game is currently still in development, so please leave any feedback you have below in the comments. Or contact directly on twitter.
